statements: SELECT * FROM CoursePrerequisites WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, prerequisites FROM CoursePrerequisites WHERE course_id > 3;
SELECT course_name FROM CoursePrerequisites WHERE course_name LIKE '%Math%';
SELECT course_id FROM CoursePrerequisites ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CoursePrerequisites WHERE prerequisites IS NOT NULL;
SELECT course_id, course_name, prerequisites FROM CoursePrerequisites WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CoursePrerequisites WHERE course_name LIKE '%Math%';
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM CoursePrerequisites ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM CoursePrerequisites WHERE prerequisites IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM CoursePrerequisites WHERE course_name = 'Physics';
SELECT * FROM course_prerequisites
SELECT course_id, prerequisite_id FROM course_prerequisites WHERE course_id = 1
SELECT prerequisite_id, course_id FROM course_prerequisites ORDER BY prerequisite_id DESC
SELECT * FROM course_sequence
SELECT course_id, next_course_id FROM course_sequence WHERE course_id = 2
SELECT * FROM course_prerequisites WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, prerequisite_id FROM course_prerequisites WHERE prerequisite_id = 3 ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT course_id, next_course_id FROM course_sequence WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY next_course_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(course_id) AS num_courses, MAX(prerequisite_id) AS max_prerequisite FROM course_prerequisites;
SELECT DISTINCT course_id, next_course_id FROM course_sequence WHERE course_id = 1 OR next_course_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM Course WHERE semester_offered = 1;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM Course ORDER BY credits DESC;
SELECT * FROM Prerequisite WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, credits, semester_offered FROM Course WHERE semester_offered IN (1, 2);
SELECT course_name, credits FROM Course WHERE semester_offered = 1;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM Course WHERE credits > 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, semester_offered FROM Course WHERE credits >= 4 ORDER BY semester_offered DESC;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM Course WHERE semester_offered = 2 AND credits < 4;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM StudentProgression WHERE semester_taken = 1 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM Course WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM Course WHERE credits < 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, credits FROM Course WHERE course_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM Course WHERE course_name LIKE '%Programming%';
SELECT * FROM Course ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM Course WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM Course WHERE credits <= 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Prerequisite WHERE prereq_course_id = 101 AND course_id = 102;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM StudentProgression WHERE grade IN ('A', 'A-') ORDER BY student_id ASC, course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM Course WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Student;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Student WHERE major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM Course WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT student_name, major FROM Student ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM Course WHERE course_name LIKE '%Data%';

SELECT Student.student_name, Course.course_name, Enrollment.completed FROM Student INNER JOIN Enrollment ON Student.student_id = Enrollment.student_id INNER JOIN Course ON Enrollment.course_id = Course.course_id;
